name: Unknown | Default
description: All rules have been failed to classify event

en.body_template: noc-classifier is failed to find appropriative classification rule
en.recommended_actions: Grab this event, create appropriative classification rule and reclassify the event again

name: Unknown | Syslog
description: All rules have been failed to classify this SYSLOG message

en.body_template:
noc-classifier is failed to find appropriative classification rule for following syslog message:
{{syslog_message}}
en.recommended_actions: Grab this event, create appropriative classification rule and reclassify the event again

name: Unknown | SNMP Trap
description: All rules have been failed to classify this SNMP TRAP

en.body_template:
noc-classifier is failed to find appropriative classification rule for following SNMP Trap OID:
{{trap_oid}}{% if trap_name %}({{trap_name}}){% endif %}
en.recommended_actions: Grab this event, create appropriative classification rule and reclassify the event again

en.probable_causes: Event without any usable information for FM
